heroSubtitle: The Ukrainian Center is an association created by Ukrainian women to support and help Ukrainians in Estonia.
heroDescription: We have united to preserve the Ukrainian language, culture and traditions, improve the life of the Ukrainian community in Estonia and find better ways for self-determination and creative realization of Ukrainians abroad.
supportDescriptionOne: Join our community and join the movement aimed at supporting Ukrainian heritage and cultural development!
supportDescriptionTwo: Your financial support will become a source of energy for preserving the Ukrainian language, culture and traditions outside Ukraine. Every donation helps us to organise events, facilitate the integration of Ukrainians in a new environment and support refugees in their time of need. Your generous support will make a difference in the lives of many people and help preserve Ukrainian identity. Let's build a future where Ukrainian culture thrives and inspires together.

news.title: Золоті руки
news.description: Спільні творчі проекти, з метою подальшого розвитку дрібного бізнесу: навчання бісероплетіння, виготовлення сувенірів, свічок, підготовки та участь у ярмарках народної творчості. За відповідних умов можливість отримання грантів для розвитку свого бізнесу.
